message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for an exclusive early-bird price of $75. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a high-quality item at a great discount.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the early bird discount, but I'm looking to get the product for a bit less. I'm willing to pay $65. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. For the next few hours, we can negotiate the price between $65 and $70. Please let me know if this range suits you better.
